sentence.Network_en: Political dissent would no longer be tolerated.
sentence.Network_cn: 政见不和将不再被容忍。

sentence.Network_en: I made a gesture of dissent.
sentence.Network_cn: 我做了个表示不同意的手势。

sentence.Network_en: It is too late now to make any dissent.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin dissentire 'differ in sentiment'

entry.tran: (尤指与多数人或权威人士的)意见不一致,意见分歧
entry.def: Dissent is strong disagreement or dissatisfaction with a decision or opinion, especially one that is supported by most people or by people in authority.

example.ex: He is the toughest military ruler yet and has responded harshly to any dissent...
example.tran: 他是迄今最强硬的军事统治者，对任何异议都一律进行打压。

example.ex: Political dissent would no longer be tolerated...
example.tran: 政见不和将不再被容忍。

entry.tran: 不同意，持异议(尤指与多数人或权威人士支持的观点、决定相左)
entry.def: If you dissent, you express disagreement with a decision or opinion, especially one that is supported by most people or by people in authority.

example.ex: Just one of the 10 members dissented...
No one dissents from the decision to unify...
example.tran: 没有人反对统一的决定。

means.word_mean: 1. (law) the difference of one judge's opinion from that of the majority;

sentences.sentence: "he expressed his dissent in a contrary opinion"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of protesting; a public (often organized) manifestation of dissent
2. express opposition through action or words;

sentences.sentence: "dissent to the laws of the country"
"She disagrees with her husband on many questions"

stems_affixes.word_buile: consent[n.&v.[to]同意,赞成,答应]+ient=ent表形容词→adj.同意的, 无异议的
dissent[v.不同意,持异议]+sion→dissension意见不合
scent=sent感觉→ n.气味，香味；香水 v.嗅猎；察觉
sent感觉+ence表名词→根据感觉来判断→判决，宣判
con共同+sent感觉→共同感觉→同意
as一再,一样+sent感觉→一样的感觉→赞同
dis分开+sent感觉→感觉不合→不同意
scent=sent感觉→ n.气味，香味；香水 v.嗅猎；察觉

means.word_mean: 意见的分歧; 不同意见; 异议

sentences.cn: 对那项决定我们表示了不同意见。

jushi.english: Most of the class wanted to have a picnic, but three boys dissented.
jushi.chinese: 班上大部分同学想野餐，但有三位男生不同意。
